Class ItemDataAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • evoter.mobile.abstracts.ItemDataAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuestionAdapter, SessionAdapter, SubjectAdapter

    public abstract class ItemDataAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    ItemDataAdapter is abstract adapter of SubjectAdapter, SessionAdapter and QuestionAdapter
